elements.MAIN_EFFECT: [][]I am [Gigantic].  When I leave the Expedition zone — []You may discard target Permanent.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Character you play this turn gains 1 boost.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: [][]I am [Gigantic].  When I leave the Expedition zone — You may pay {1}. If you do: [Sabotage].
[][]I am [Gigantic].  When I leave the Expedition zone — If I have 1 or more boosts: Put the top two cards of your deck in your Mana zone (as exhausted Mana Orbs).
[][]I am [Gigantic].  When I leave the Expedition zone — [][Sabotage].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []You may have target Character other than me lose [[Fleeting]].

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: [][]I am [Gigantic].  When I leave the Expedition zone — You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: Draw a card.
[][]I am [Gigantic].  When I leave the Expedition zone — If you control one or more Landmarks: You may discard target Permanent.
[][]I am [Gigantic].  When I leave the Expedition zone — []You may discard target Permanent.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Character you play this turn loses [[Fleeting]].

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: [][]I am [Gigantic].  When I leave the Expedition zone — You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: You may put me in my owner's Mana zone (as an exhausted Mana Orb).
[][]I am [Gigantic].  When I leave the Expedition zone — If you control one or more Landmarks: Put the top two cards of your deck in your Mana zone (as exhausted Mana Orbs).
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Character you play from your hand this turn activates its {r} abilities.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: [][]I am [Gigantic].  When I go to Reserve from the Expedition zone — If I have 1 or more boosts: [Sabotage].
[][]I am [Gigantic].  {R} If you control two or more [[Boosted]] Characters: Put the top card of your deck in your Mana zone (as an exhausted Mana Orb).
[][]I am [Gigantic].  When I go to Reserve from the Expedition zone — If I have 1 or more boosts: [Sabotage].
[][]I am [Gigantic].  When I go to Reserve from the Expedition zone — You may discard one of your Mana Orbs. If you do: [Sabotage].
[][]I am [Gigantic].  At Dusk — If you control one or more Landmarks: Put the top two cards of your deck in your Mana zone (as exhausted Mana Orbs).
[][]I am [Gigantic].  {J} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: Put the top two cards of your deck in your Mana zone (as exhausted Mana Orbs).
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Character you play from your hand this turn activates its {r} abilities.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: [][]I am [Gigantic].  At Dusk — You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: Put the top card of your deck in your Mana zone (as an exhausted Mana Orb).  When a Character you control gains 1 or more boosts — []You may have target Character other than me lose [[Fleeting]].
[][]I am [Gigantic].  {J} If you control one or more Landmarks: [Resupply].  {R} []Put the top card of your deck in your Mana zone (as an exhausted Mana Orb).
[][]I am [Gigantic].  {R} []You may discard target Character with Hand Cost {4} or more.  When I go to Reserve from the Expedition zone — If you control one or more Landmarks: Draw a card.
